name: Gold Rush (erichalina)
description:
Time is Money!

Welcome to Gold Rush, a short precision platformer about acquiring large amounts of currency as quickly as possible.

Blast your way through 4 fast-paced levels, collecting coins and obliterating any cute slime that stands between you and sweet sweet capitalism!!

Installation Instructions:

- download the zip folder

- unpack the zip folder

- run gold_rush.exe on Windows, run gold_rush.dmg on macOS

note: make sure the .pck file is in the same folder / directory as the executable, as it has all of the assets within it!

Credits:

Game and Sound by Eric Halina

Pixel Art Assets by o_lobster

https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

Made with love and Godot Engine :)

Special thanks to Games Den @ UofA

If you played the game and loved it / hated it / want to get in touch with me with your thoughts about it, it would really help me out if you filled out this questionnaire about the game! I am learning game development, and feedback is greatly encouraged and appreciated so I can improve in the future!
